mapper.insert: INSERT into Gat_Recommand(memNick, gatNo, gatReCheck) SELECT '${memNick}', ${gatNo},0 FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM Gat_Recommand WHERE memNick='${memNick}' AND gatNo=${gatNo})
mapper.select: SELECT gatReCheck FROM Gat_Recommand WHERE memNick = '${memNick}' AND gatNo = ${gatNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE Gathering AS a, Gat_Recommand AS b SET a.gatRecommand = a.gatRecommand+1, b.gatReCheck= 1 WHERE a.gatNo =${gatNo} AND b.memNick = '${memNick}' AND b.gatReCheck = 0
